com.intel.bigdatamem

Interface Allocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Allocatable<A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigDataMemAllocator, BigDataPMemAllocator, CommonAllocator, CommonPersistAllocator, SysMemAllocator

    public interface Allocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
extends Allocatable<A>
    a interface to allocate big memory resource from any underlying memory kind of storage and manage automatically reclaiming of memory resources.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Release the memory pool and close it.
      A disableActiveGC()
      disable active garbage collection.
      A enableActiveGC(long timeout)
      enable active garbage collection.
      void sync() 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intel.bigdatamem.Allocatable

        createBuffer, createBuffer, createChunk, createChunk, registerBufferAutoReclaim, registerChunkAutoReclaim, resizeBuffer, resizeChunk

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Release the memory pool and close it.
        See Also:
        BigDataMemAllocator.close()

      • sync

        void sync()
        See Also:
        BigDataMemAllocator.sync()

      • enableActiveGC

        A enableActiveGC(long timeout)
        enable active garbage collection. the GC will be forced to perform when there is no more space to allocate.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout is used to yield for GC performing
        Returns:
        this object
        See Also:
        BigDataMemAllocator.enableActiveGC(long)

      • disableActiveGC

        A disableActiveGC()
        disable active garbage collection.
        Returns:
        this object
        See Also:
        BigDataMemAllocator.disableActiveGC()
